SELECT COUNT(PROD_L_CODE) FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM=#{compId}
AND PROD_L_QUANTITY >= 50
AND PROD_L_QUANTITY < 50 AND PROD_L_QUANTITY > 0
AND PROD_L_QUANTITY = 0
AND ${columnNm} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%')
SELECT count(OL.ORD_L_CODE) FROM ORDER_LIST OL JOIN ORDER_BOARD OB ON (OL.ORD_L_USER=OB.USER_ID) WHERE OL.ORD_L_CODE IN (SELECT PROD_L_CODE FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM = #{compId})

SELECT count(OL.ORD_L_CODE) FROM ORDER_LIST OL JOIN ORDER_BOARD OB ON (OL.ORD_L_USER=OB.USER_ID) WHERE OL.ORD_L_CODE IN (SELECT PROD_L_CODE FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM = #{compId}) AND ORD_DELIVERY_STATUS =#{ordDeliveryStatus}
SELECT sum((ORD_L_QUANTITY * ORD_L_PRICE)) as ordFinalprice FROM ORDER_LIST WHERE ORD_L_CODE IN (SELECT PROD_L_CODE FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM = #{compId})

SELECT (SELECT count(PROD_L_CODE) FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM=#{compId} AND PROD_L_QUANTITY >= 50) as ge50Count ,(SELECT count(PROD_L_CODE) FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM=#{compId} AND PROD_L_QUANTITY < 50 AND PROD_L_QUANTITY > 0) as ne50Count ,(SELECT count(PROD_L_CODE) FROM PRODUCT_LIST WHERE PROD_L_COMPNM=#{compId} AND PROD_L_QUANTITY = 0) as eq50Couunt FROM dual

SELECT ol.ORD_L_CODE as ordLCode ,ol.ORD_L_USER as ordLUser ,ol.ORD_L_QUANTITY as ordLQuantity ,ol.ORD_L_PRICE as ordLPrice ,ol.ORD_L_COUPONNUM as ordLCouponnum ,ol.ORD_DELIVERY_STATUS as ordDeliveryStatus ,ol.ORD_L_DELIV_NUMBER as ordLDelivNumber ,ol.ORD_PURCHASESTATUS as ordPurchasestatus ,ol.ORD_L_DATE as ordLDate ,ob.ORD_GET_ADDRESS as ordGetAddress ,ob.ORD_DELIVERY_MESSAGE as ordDeliveryMessage ,ob.ORD_TOTAL_PRICE as ordTotalPrice ,ob.ORD_COUPONDC as ordCouponDc ,ob.ORD_FINALPRICE as ordFinalPrice ,ob.ORD_GET_NM as ordGetNm ,ob.ORD_GET_PHONE as ordGetPhone ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID=#{ordLUser}) as ordLUserNm FROM ORDER_LIST as ol JOIN ORDER_BOARD as ob ON (ol.ORD_L_USER=ob.USER_ID) WHERE ORD_L_USER=#{ordLUser} AND ol.ORD_L_CODE = #{ordLCode};
